website_summaries.verdict: Choose this set for the cat that loves feathers as much as her owner loves indulging in playtime with her. It comes with enough feathered toys and a versatile wand for hours of play.
pros: The perfect gift set for interactive play, thanks to the 3-section adjustable wand
Several toys have sturdy feathers that playful cats can't resist
cons: Some customers wish it had more attachable toys to go with the wand

customer_reviews.title: Great set of toys
customer_reviews.text: This wand is wonderful. It is stronger than any other wand system ever purchased for playing with the cats. Including home-made wooden ones. More flexible. The toy attachment system has lasted longer than any other. There are some toys in the set that are stand alone toys and don't attach to the wand. They liked all of them except for the hard sisal-type mouse. Biggest hit was the fuzzy worm thingy. I had to buy more of those. The company made those available as a separate group because they were very popular.
customer_reviews.author: Vexed

customer_reviews.title: Best feather toys
customer_reviews.text: Alabama loves her new feather toys. She really goes crazy for them. One thing I did was remove the clip used to put on new toys and replaced It with a fishing swivel I had. The clip that came with this wand was quite big and I imagine would hurt if she got hit with it. I do really like the thickness of the rope and the foam handle. I’ll definetly be ordering refill feathers from this company as she really likes those and they flew and spun excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Daniyel

customer_reviews.title: Cat enjoys and good value
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase so far and so is my cat, lol. Durability is good as it lasted many months now as lot of feathers I buy don't make it a month. The little black mouse is my cat's favorite and she has a little destroyed it by now 3 months later. I wish I could buy some of the little mice by themselves. The wand is nice but it keeps wanting to come unscrewed so I gently used some pliers to tighten up and no more issues
customer_reviews.author: gurubob

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, your cat will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves to play with it. She starts working herself up when she sees me take the little blue storage bag down--it is hilarious! The only negative is a couple of the loose toys (not the ones that attach to the wand) did not hold up after only a few hours of extreme cat play. The cat literally tore them apart. They became an undone danger; rope pieces to be swallowed. The wand is sturdy and is still holding up well, even with my fat cat pulling it down and trying to bend it. She totally enjoys playing and exercising with it, jumping surprisingly high to catch the "birds". My cat is really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Domivel

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 cats and all love playing with this Pet Fit for Life teaser! Right now I have the feather & another toy on the wand & it entertains them endlessly. I bought the one with several toys and glad I did. It is very sturdy & so easy to change the toy on it or remove one section of the wand if you want it shorter. Excellent play toy for cats & well worth the price which was not excessive.
customer_reviews.author: Lovecats

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever! Can’t go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy I’ve ever gotten for my kitty. She’s 2 and just loves to play but when I bring out this one she lights up. I actually have to hide it cause she follows me to see where I put it. She never gets bored with it. So far every thing in the package has held up to her enthusiastic play. I love the bag the toys come in also. I highly recommend this for you kitty. I’m sure it would hold up to multiple cats too.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours! Be cautious of the small “extra” toy it comes with
customer_reviews.text: My cats are in love!! They play for hours! The only reason for 4 stars and not 5, is that one of the extra toys is so small it’s a choking hazard. My cat coughed up the small black mouse and it was kind of scary. I know this means he just loved it a lot, but still... Aside from that this is their favorite toy!!
customer_reviews.author: kristen aldridge

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite toys!
customer_reviews.text: has wr My cat absolutely loves these toys, especially the wand and attachable toys. So much so, that he wore out one of them. Truth be told, the little green snake/worm is not very well constructed and that's the one he obliterated. The rest of the toys are well constructed. I ended up buying a second set because he was in mourning the loss of it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Almond

customer_reviews.title: Good variety to learn what your cat likes!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat LOVES the wand, more than any loose toy. this variety pack helped us learn what she likes best (the fuzzy worms by far). Our cat also gets bored easily, so the variety meant we could keep her guessing. Not all the toys attach to the wand, FYI. But this is a nice, cost-effective way to get a toy collection started!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: A great staring set
customer_reviews.text: This set gives you a bit of everything, but some of the items are too fragile for my kittens as it can easily tear off and some pieces have torn off. Other items are sturdy and are fine. My two cats enjoy the long green felt snake item. Very enjoyable. Would recommend, just inspect the items before giving to your cat, if your cat is the wild type.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Cat and ai both love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best I have ever had. Love that you can just unhook each piece and change as often as you want. Also it will fit into my "cat drawer" since it comes in 2 pieces. Oh, and my cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Susannadanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: The pole is very sturdy, I can see it lasting forever. Good variety of toys. Don't use most of them, cat is much more interested in the green "worm" than anything else. Great value, lots of toys and a sturdy pole for not a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: great variety and value
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this package of toys. They destroy them just the same as all the rest but this pack has great variety for our 2 cats that typically get bored of every toy after 10 minutes. Overall its a great price for the value and variety of the toys,
customer_reviews.author: sneakyright

customer_reviews.title: Good little mix of toys! My cats love them.
customer_reviews.text: The rod that's adjustable and interchangeable with several of the toys is a really good feature that keeps my cats interested in playing with it. I got it on a flash sale for $8 so it was an amazing price for all of that!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Gal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and thick pole
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple cat toys with the poles. This one by far is the best. I love that it comes with a bad for the attachments since I’m always losing the pieces. Also the pole is very steredy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: No more chubby kitty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this looking for a way to get my 11 year old cat healthier. She loves, loves, loves play time with this! She hears me get it out and comes running and it keeps her attention for quite a while. I like the variety of toys included, just be aware they do not all have the swivel to fasten them to the string. Just a few days of regular play and she is already a more svelte cat!
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 cats, but bought this specifically because one of them is a little overweight. He's having the most fun of all, goes to the bag and begs to play but all 3 are having a great time. It's even helping 2 of them that don't get along well play together. The whole family is spending a lot of time enjoying kitty playtime. Good variety as nd well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Furletti

customer_reviews.title: Most used cat toy we have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: My cats, kitten and puppy love this toy and used it all the time, even without human interaction. My kitten likes to "kill" it and drag the toy and wand through the house as her prize and fights off anyone who tries to take it from her. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Fox

customer_reviews.title: Decent but all toys don’t attach
customer_reviews.text: Only half of these toys actually attach to the wand, the wand and toys seem to be decent quality
customer_reviews.author: ktg3925

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for my overactive cat
customer_reviews.text: We received this yesterday and it appears to be very well made. I like the fact that it comes apart into smaller pieces, so I can hide it in my nightstand drawer. My cat tends to pull toys out in the middle of the night and come drop them in my face. I also like the bag to store it in. It keeps everything together. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SoIndianaTrish

customer_reviews.title: The most fun you and you furrrline will have together!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the retractable wand and the 3 piece wand. I don’t care for the 3piece. It’s heavier and less bendable. And my girls like to get a little crazy. I feel like when they run into the 3 piece, it stuns them. But BEST TOY EVER! I have to keep a backup in the house. The clips to put on a off toys are easy and the attachments are sturdy. BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy product, cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Wand is heavier than I thought it would be and while the attachments seem very good quality they are heavy as well, so might hurt kittens. This were exactly as pictured, although mine is missing one of the mouse toys, but happy with product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Teej

customer_reviews.title: Amazing except for the hook for changing the toys hurts to open up
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!!! Great wands and toys and i like how the rod collspses. My only complaint is the hook which is impossible to open for me so i bought a seperate rod set that has easier hook set up. But the toys and tod are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Dee DeMuth

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves fishing pole toys. I have to keep them away when unattended because she’ll chew through the cord, then she will mope until I fix it. All the pieces are well made and the pole is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Marymoon

customer_reviews.title: Fun assortment of cat toys for a good price
customer_reviews.text: My brother's cats destroy everything so I got him this large assortment of inexpensive toys. I'm sure his demon cats have destroyed them, but enjoyed themselves while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Punchbuggy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitty,  bad for mommy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I bough all the varieties for my new kitten. Worms are his favorite. I now have carpal tunnels using this toy. Wish someone will come up with a toy that will move on it’s own.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby C.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but heavy. Cat loves it. My arm gets tried before he does. Toys hold up so far, in fact he is very rough with them. Surprised that are taking the abuse he gives them.
customer_reviews.author: Mugs

customer_reviews.title: My cat plays with it every day
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built and our very active Bengal cat loves it and plays with it every day . She gets satisfaction of catching it rather than laser pointer
customer_reviews.author: Dr jim

customer_reviews.title: Great products!!!
customer_reviews.text: I order all of my Henry's toys from Pet Fit for Life. They are the best!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: ... attach onto the fishing rod so was a little disappointed about that
customer_reviews.text: cat likes the feather ones only and they don't all attach onto the fishing rod so was a little disappointed about that. still work the money and am glad i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love some of the toys and don't care for others but great price!
customer_reviews.author: rainen

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely has a great time playing with this
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy and we'll made.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest cat toy I have ever owned! So we'll made. I recommend it to all cat lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Cofer

customer_reviews.title: It's inexpensive and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Best cat toy ever - everybody loves this toy from my 17 year guy to the baby who's 4! Love that you can change the toys and there is always renewed interest!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Faber

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 attachment toys, 4 others are standalone toys
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this was I thought we were getting 8 attachment toys, which my cats love. And they go through them pretty fast. We have plenty of stand-alone toys, so I wouldn't have paid so much for only 4 attachments, as we also have plenty of rods for attachments. I didn't see the review that was the only one that pointed this out until after I ordered.... I guess this may be good for a family with no cat toys and are looking for a starter set...?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: MY cats love the toys. The pole is quite sturdy and long. Good quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: YJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Length
customer_reviews.text: Young male cat ate and destroyed a couple of the attachments immediately- but you really can't beat the length for kitties with energy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat
customer_reviews.text: This has become my cats favorite toy. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Allen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Leo absolutely loves it. The pole bend just enough for some great reflex action. We played for over 30 minutes and he still wanted to go. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunnalyn Waldor

customer_reviews.title: Great cat fun.
customer_reviews.text: A nice assortment of cat toys, some with rings that can be attached to the included wand and others for free play. Always a big hit with our cats and kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Matlack Klein

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cat Toy
customer_reviews.text: This amazing cat toy is a joy for any cat.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cat Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat went crazy over this. She comes running whenever I pick it up. She has fished the pieces not in use out of their storage bag. Best cat toy I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Kerish

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but not quite as described
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and that cats love it -- but only four of the accessories are actually attachments, the other four (the three mice except the blue one with feathers) one and the feathered ball) are standalone cat toys.
customer_reviews.author: Merwenna

product_meta.title: Pet Fit For Life Feather Teaser and Exerciser for Cat and Kitten - Cat Toy Interactive Cat Wand 3 Section 8 Piece
feature_bullets: ★ LIMITED TIME LOW INTRODUCTORY PRICE ***NEW FROM PET FIT FOR LIFE*** 8 GREAT TOYS(4 ATTACHMENTS, 4 STAND ALONE TOYS) PLUS A 3 SECTION THREADED WAND – We out did ourselves on this one. All the great features of our previous versions and a whole lot more!

★ EXCLUSIVE NEW FEATURES MAKE THIS WAND THE BEST – **NEW 3 SECTION WAND** Versatile and flexible. 3 interchangeable sections, use it long with the 3 sections or remove a section to shorten the wand for more control. **NEW EASY ON/EASY OFF CLASP** No more broken fingernails, this new clasp makes it so simple to change up the action.

★ SOFT, DURABLE HANDLE – We were the first company to develop the soft, durable, foam handle. So easy to grip and hold onto while you play. We guarantee you will never buy another wand without it! We thank all our customers for their great suggestions.

★ PERFECT GIFT FOR ALL YOUR CAT LOVING FRIENDS. The of the Pet Fit For Life cat wands make the ideal gift for anyone, including your own cat. What a great way to keep your cat healthy and fit for life! (Simply click the Pet Fit For Life link below our product title above to see our great selection of cat wands)

★ **NOTE** Always supervise your cat when playing with this, or any, cat toy. Please put the toys in a safe place when not in use. This practice will add lots of life to your new cat toy. Thank you for choosing our product, we really appreciate your business!
